languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь отпихнуть от себя морду лошади, но руку ведет в сторону. Ладони ничего не чувствуют, ведь кожа на них — натянутый на вас помимо воли неловкий мясной костюм. Пальцы сжимаются сами по себе.{/n}

{n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь отпихнуть от себя морду лошади, но руку ведет в сторону. Ладони ничего не чувствуют, ведь кожа на них — натянутый на вас помимо воли неловкий мясной костюм. Пальцы сжимаются сами по себе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图将马头推开，但手却偏离了方向。你的掌心没有任何感觉，因为你手掌上的皮肤就仿佛笨重的肉盖子一样，仿佛你的灵魂被强行塞进了别人的身体里。你的手指不受控制地卷曲起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图将马头推开，但手却偏离了方向。你的掌心没有任何感觉，因为你手掌上的皮肤就仿佛笨重的肉盖子一样，仿佛你的灵魂被强行塞进了别人的身体里。你的手指不受控制地卷曲起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas alejar de ti la cabeza equina, pero tu mano se desvía. No sientes nada en las palmas porque la piel que las cubre no es más que un envoltorio de carne adherido de mala manera a tu esqueleto. Tus dedos se crispan como si tuviesen voluntad propia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas alejar de ti la cabeza equina, pero tu mano se desvía. No sientes nada en las palmas porque la piel que las cubre no es más que un envoltorio de carne adherido de mala manera a tu esqueleto. Tus dedos se crispan como si tuviesen voluntad propia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafayı kendinden uzaklaştırmaya çalışıyorsun ama elin yana sapıyor. Avuçların hiçbir şey hissetmiyor çünkü üzerlerindeki deri, sadece iskeletine zorla çekilmiş hantal bir et örtüsünden ibaret. Parmakların kendi kendine bükülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kafayı kendinden uzaklaştırmaya çalışıyorsun ama elin yana sapıyor. Avuçların hiçbir şey hissetmiyor çünkü üzerlerindeki deri, sadece iskeletine zorla çekilmiş hantal bir et örtüsünden ibaret. Parmakların kendi kendine bükülüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたからその頭をどけようとするが、手はそれてしまう。あなたの手のひらは何も感じない。なぜなら、その皮膚があなたの体格に無理やりに乗せられた不格好な肉の膜に過ぎないからである。あなたの指は、その意志で丸まっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたからその頭をどけようとするが、手はそれてしまう。あなたの手のひらは何も感じない。なぜなら、その皮膚があなたの体格に無理やりに乗せられた不格好な肉の膜に過ぎないからである。あなたの指は、その意志で丸まっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que vous essayez de repousser la bête, votre main dévie. Vos paumes ne ressentent rien, car la chair qui les recouvre n'est rien de plus qu'une couverture de viande qui recouvre votre corps. Vos doigts se recroquevillent d'eux-mêmes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous essayez de repousser la bête, votre main dévie. Vos paumes ne ressentent rien, car la chair qui les recouvre n'est rien de plus qu'une couverture de viande qui recouvre votre corps. Vos doigts se recroquevillent d'eux-mêmes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, den Kopf wegzustoßen, doch deine Hand greift ins Leere. Deine Handflächen sind gefühllos, weil die ihre Haut nur eine Hülle aus Fleisch ist, die gewaltsam über deinen Körper gezogen wurde. Deine Finger krümmen sich ohne dein Zutun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to shove the head away from you, but your hand veers off. Your palms feel nothing, because the skin on them is just some unwieldy meat cover forcibly pulled onto your frame. Your fingers curl up of their own accord.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, den Kopf wegzustoßen, doch deine Hand greift ins Leere. Deine Handflächen sind gefühllos, weil die ihre Haut nur eine Hülle aus Fleisch ist, die gewaltsam über deinen Körper gezogen wurde. Deine Finger krümmen sich ohne dein Zutun.{/n}
